name: INVISIBLE SNOWBALL FIGHT!
description:
Invisible Snowball Fight

It's a snowball fight, but everyone's invisible!

It's simple - jump into a server, invite some friends and play! We're here all Christmas, after December we're off! The Village Plaza will teach you the controls.

More maps are on the way and maybe a new game mode!

We have a more up-to-date homepage at http://invisiblesnowballfight.online with more about us and updates (when they come!)

Please Donate - WAIT NO, NOT TO US!

It's Christmas! The world is bigger than us and others can find this time of year very difficult. Please consider donating a little bit to charity via our JustGiving pages. Your donation will appear in-game as a pile of giftboxes (amounting to your donation in £)!

GamesAid: https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/invisible-plaza-gameaid

Cancer Research UK: https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/invisible-plaza-cancer

Shelter: https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/invisible-plaza-shelter

Team SWAM

Louis,  @DigitalBasilisk , Luigi, and Andreea

More about us on the game's homepage!
